H0.text: Roughly how many bubbles are in a standard bottle of champagne. 200,000

H1.text: Roughly how many bubbles are in a standard bottle of champagne. 1 billion

H2.text: Roughly how many bubbles are in a standard bottle of champagne. 10,000

H3.text: Roughly how many bubbles are in a standard bottle of champagne. 50million

A4.text: the average bottle of champagne contains enough carbon dioxide to potentially produce 49 million bubbles.

A5.text: Wine expert Tom Stevenson puts the number at 250 million.
